data.name: Ballad of the Boundless Blue
data.passiveDescription: Within 6s after Normal or Charged Attacks hit an opponent, Normal Attack DMG will be increased by {{8//10//12//14//16%}} and Charged Attack DMG will be increased by {{6//7.5//9//10.5//12%}}. Max 3 stacks. This effect can be triggered once every 0.3s.
